DOC.brief_summary: This is an open-label, uncontrolled, multicenter phase II clinical trial. The purpose of this study is to evaluate acute toxicity and efficacy of cisplatin and 5-Fu combined with nimotuzumab in patients with untreated metastatic nasopharyngeal carcinoma.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Chemotherapy Combined With Nimotuzumab in Untreated Metastatic Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma
